Vehicle breakdowns: Long distances and varying road conditions can cause vehicles to break down, leading to delays and additional costs for repairs or rental cars.

Navigation challenges: With so many different routes and highways to choose from, finding the most efficient and scenic routes can be challenging, especially if there are no GPS or mobile phone signals.
Weather conditions: Bad weather can make driving dangerous and uncomfortable, causing delays or cancellations of the trip.
Lack of accommodations: Finding suitable accommodation along the way can be difficult, especially in popular tourist areas, leading toiety or staying in subpar lodging.
Foodiety: Eating out for every meal can be expensive, and finding good food options in rural or remote areas can be challenging.
